DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate plasma cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) pharmacokinetics ( PK ) multiple dos ASP3652 healthy young Caucasian male subject . Also evaluate plasma CSF pharmacodynamics ( PD ) multiple dos ASP3652 healthy young Caucasian male subject assess safety tolerability multiple dos ASP3652 healthy young Caucasian male subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Appearance Disappearance ASP3652 Blood Spinal Fluid Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Screening take place Day -22 Day -2 . Subjects admit clinical Day -1 remain Day 12 . On Days 5 9 , subject receive twice-daily dos ASP3652 , single dose morning Day 10 . Subjects fast 10h morning dose Days 5 9 serve first standard meal 1h morning dose . A spinal tap use collect cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) Day 1 Day 10 . A plasma sample PK sample obtain first dose Day 5 . To confirm steady-state concentration ASP3652 plasma , blood sample obtain morning dose Days 7 , 9 10 , even dose Days 5 , 7 9 . On Day 10 , PK profile ASP3652 plasma obtain 48h morning dose 24h CSF . Profiles several enzyme substrate plasma seminal fluid ( exploratory ) obtain Day 1 Day 10 24h CSF 48h plasma , morning even dose Days 5 , 7 9 plasma . Vital sign , 12-lead electrocardiogram ( ECGs ) , safety laboratory assessment , adverse event ( AEs ) concomitant medication monitor throughout investigational period ESV .
DOC.criteria: Subject white Caucasian origin . Body Mass Index equal 18.5 less 30.0 kg/m2 . Male subject must agree practice adequate contraceptive method female sexual partner prevent pregnancy . Known suspected hypersensitivity ASP3652 component formulation use . History excessive bleeding bruising . Abnormalities coagulation screen include platelet count , prothrombin time ( PT ) activate partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) .
